item.title: PayPal signs deal with OpenAI to become the first payments wallet in ChatGPT
item.description: The move makes PayPal an early part of OpenAI's efforts to broaden ChatGPT's use for e-commerce.

item.title: The Fed has a rate cut plus a bunch of other things on its plate this week. Here's what to expect
item.description: The easy part for the Federal Reserve this week will be announcing a rate cut when it wraps up its meeting Wednesday.

item.title: 'We're trying to shame them': Upstart activist investors target America's underperforming banks
